name: Pote Snitkin
Lore: 'Skrilling smuggler. Supplied Jabba''s henchmen with weapons when he was Hermi Odle''s predecessor. An excellent driver.',
Text: 'When driving a vehicle, that vehicle is power +3 and moves for free. While at Audience Chamber, all your other Skrillings are power +2 and forfeit +1.',
